name: Active GIF Creator Project
summary: Learn about .AGIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Active GIF Creator projects are saved with an ".agif" extension, while the final animated GIF files are exported with the standard ".gif" extension.

description: An AGIF file is a GIF file created with Active GIF Creator. It is a project file that can be opened and viewed in Active GIF Creator projects. When opened in Active GIF Creator, it shows sequence of images that finally make up for the finalized GIF file with .gif extension.
GIF animation created with Active GIF Creator, a program for creating and optimizing animated .GIF images; contains a sequence of images that can be viewed and edited with Active GIF Creator.
